title: A2A Extensions: Empowering Custom Agent Functionality
summary: A2A Extensions provide a flexible way to add custom functionalities to agent-to-agent communication, going beyond the core A2A protocol. They enable specialized features and are openly defined and implemented.
content: A2A Extensions provide a flexible way to add custom functionalities to agent-to-agent communication, going beyond the core A2A protocol. They enable specialized features and are openly defined and implemented.
